name: Private, spacious room in Brooklyn
space: To yourself, you'll have a spacious room furnished with a comfortable queen sized futon. Clean sheets, blankets, pillows, and shampoo/conditioner are provided, as well as fresh towels and wardrobe space. (There are no additional charges for these items.) We provide you with your own set of house keys, including for your private room.  We don't impose a curfew so you're welcome to come and go as you like -- make yourself at home! There is one bathroom in the unit with a sink, toilet, and shower/tub to be used by all.  While communication about timing for the use of the bathroom for morning and evening schedules is always beneficial, we have never had any issues sharing this space with guests. You are also welcome to share the other common spaces as well -- living room with Apple TV and DVD set-up, kitchen, and dining table.  Our home is strictly non-smoking, but the building's outdoor courtyard is only one flight downstairs with benches available. OUR FAMILY We are a married couple with

name: Cozy and Bright One Bedroom in BK
space: Spacious and newly renovated one bedroom apartment just north of McCarren Park in Greenpoint, Brooklyn (on the Williamsburg border - perfect location!)  One block from Nassau G Train, 10 minute walk to Bedford L Train (one stop to Manhattan).  Close to great restaurants and bars - favorites include Five Leaves (incredible brunch) and No Name Bar (there's no sign out front, so you have to know it's there!)  The apartment is on the 2nd floor, and features a full size bed and large sectional couch. There is an upright piano in the living room, tuned and ready to play.  Sunlight really pours into the bedroom, keeping it bright and warm.  The building is quaint and quiet, and a perfect place to retire to after a day of exploring the city. Many of the past reviews mention a cat who lived here, but she will no longer be here while guests are visiting!

name: Truly Amazing Oasis In The City
space: Holiday or business trip to New York City? Williamsburg is the spot for the globe-trotting young and hip. The coolest bars, restaurants, galleries and shopping in NYC in one of the most centrally-located and sought-after neighborhoods in the city. Just a 5 minute walk to the famous Bedford Avenue L train station (2 minute ride from Manhattan's East Village). Fully furnished. Gorgeous Wood Floors, Full Kitchen, exposed original wood beams, jacuzzi, free laundry + wi-fi and a huge Brooklyn Botanic Backyard on a quiet and safe landmarked historic street in the heart of it all. You are literally just steps from everything in the neighborhood (supermarkets, coffee roasters, cheese shops, bars, restaurants), and you are closer to downtown Manhattan (Soho, Village, Tribeca), than if you stayed in Midtown Manhattan. 10 minutes to Manhattan on the subway... including your walk. This very comfortable studio apartment sleeps 4 people and has a microwave, toaster, coffee maker, hairdryer, ironing

name: East Village Charmer
space: This charming three room, one bedroom apt in the East Village has lots of the old New York charm and was painstakingly renovated in November 2012. Added in the most recent renovation is a standing shower in the kitchen, a lovely sleeping loft, a king-size Tempurpedic mattress, 42" flat screen TV, and a European style cooking kitchen with a under-the-counter two drawer refrigerator. The Apt. name: Architect's Brownstone
space: Our gorgeous brownstone, deck and backyard is located on the most beautiful, quiet, tree-lined block in Park Slope.  It is a duplex recently designed by AJSDesign. The house includes 3 bedrooms (king, twin, and twin +  extra floor mattresses if needed), a separate study boasting an egg-shaped free standing stone-bath, and a contemplative area, overlooking our back yard.  The bedrooms floor includes a wet room, and another full shower.  The living floor includes a piano, and decorated in a tasteful mix of modern furniture and organic wood. The kitchen is a stunning combination of stainless steel and raw wood, and fully equipped chef's cooking facilities.  There is a living area and separate large dining area. The basement includes a washer-dryer.  The backyard includes a large trampoline. We are a quick 15 minutes car or train ride from downtown Manhattan, and are located 2 short blacks away from many trains. name: LUXURY SOHO 2 Bedroom Apt
space: I am looking to rent my luxurious and spacious (1000sq. feet), two bedroom apartment in Nolita, a very high-end and luxurious neighborhood in New York City, steps away from Soho.  The area is one of New York's most desirable locations and is filled with shops, restaurants, art galleries and museums.  It is in walking distance of Little Italy, Chinatown, Greenwich Village and The Lower East Side. It is also close to many subways and a short taxi ride way to Times Square and Central Park.   The apartment is beautifully decorated and newly renovated. It also has wireless internet connection, a 47" Plasma HDTV with cable, exposed brick, wood floors, skylights, etc., along with a beautiful outdoor garden area. It is also equipped with every amenity one could need in the kitchen and/or home. Its really a find for the city and is just a beautiful place.  Please let me know if you are interested and would like to learn more. Cheers!

name: Garden apartment close to Manhattan
space: Artist and Architect owned 1860 townhouse in the BAM historic district in Fort Greene, Brooklyn near one of the largest subway hubs in the city.   Experience New York from the vantage of one of Brooklyn’s earlier neighborhoods and make your visit of New York more memorable.  The apartment is on the garden level with a separate entrance under the stoop.  You will be in easy walking distance to the Atlantic Terminal with LIRR access to Airtrain (1 hour to JFK by train) and nearly every subway; 2. 3. 4. 5. B, C, D, G, N, Q, R, (15  minutes to Manhattan).  There are many restaurants nearby in Fort Greene as well as local fashion stores and a shopping mall.  The Brooklyn Academy of Music offers year round venues as well as concerts in Fort Greene Park.    Studio apartment can accommodate up to 3 persons.  One queen sized bed and one twin.  The apartment has a kitchen, bath, a washer / dryer and access to a garden patio.  No smoking, no pets, no parties.

name: EAST VILLAGE STUDIO, sunny & quiet
space: Greetings from the East Village and welcome to my apartment. It's a fantastic place in my favorite New York neighborhood with hundreds of restaurants and bars within a few steps. Located in the heart of the East Village, my apartment is newly renovated, with a super comfortable bed, couch, kitchen and bathroom. There is lots of sun in the apartment in the afternoon and it is incredibly quiet since it faces the backyard and a retirement center across the way. For transportation, the apartment is a 10 minute walk to the L train or the F train and a 5 minute walk to local buses. Taxis are easily accessible as well. Please email me if you have any questions, would like more pictures or need references of folks who have rented at my place before. If you're interested in weekly or monthly rates, let me know. Looking forward to hearing from you and please tell me a bit about yourself as when in your message. Cheers.

name: The Heart of Prime Williamsburg
space: This vibey, spacious and bright apartment is an oasis located right in the middle of the action of prime Northside Williamsburg (even though the listing shows up as Greenpoint), a block and a half away from the Bedford L stop.  Even though it's right on Bedford Avenue (btw N 8th and N 9th) it can feel like a world away from the bustle with an outlook onto a leafy backyard. Amazing restaurants and cafes are minutes away including Hotel Delmano, Cafe Collette, El Beit (incredible coffee), Egg, 5 Leaves, Manhattan Inn, McCarren Park, Farmer's market, Brooklyn Flea, Nitehawk Cinema and other gems of the 'burg and Greenpoint are all a short walk away.  Yoga schools, gyms, and McCarren pool are all also a short walk away. Literally 5 minutes to Manhattan on the subway on the L train (station is two blocks away), although you'll never want to leave the area! name: Historical home w/ exceptional space, light & art
space: Parlor Floor When you enter the house, you can enjoy the historical parlor floor with 13 feet high ceiling and original 19th century details. In the middle parlor, you can hang out in the art filled room with original white marble fireplaces or pull down the film screen and project a movie. In the front parlor, you are welcome to play piano or sit and enjoy on the sun drenched sofa and armchairs. There is a half bath on this floor. As you go up and down the 3 stories, you will travel on the elegant mahogany staircase.   2nd Floor This floor is fully equipped for cooking and eating in the 500 sq ft dining room with 4 large windows. name: Greenpoint Spacious Loft
space: Similar to the contrast between the city skyline seen from our roof and the bird sanctuary outside of our window, we built a loft that captures an NY artists energy and a quiet refuge.  We our so lucky to live here and even more to share our home. Cozy 800 square ft loft with views of city skyline.  Rooftop access and a location 2 blocks from East River ferry or subway giving you almost instant access to New York city whether visiting or admiring from across the river. Would you believe that Brooklyn is quiet?  Maybe not all of our borough is so sweet and serene, but we are lucky enough to wake up to a bird sanctuary in our backyard.  Our FOUR large  windows look out to trees and beyond that, the midtown skyline.  After living street-side in my first two apartments here,  I thought New York really was the city that never sleeps.  Now I know that some of us sleep perfectly well!  You just need to be in our apartment. Great shops and restaurants in our quiet neighborhood give you perfect

You are surrounded by some of the best food, coffee, music venues, shopping in all of New York. The flea market, and famous Smorgasburg are just down the block. name: Hancock Town House!-Stuyvesant Mews
space: Hello, my name is Fred.  This is a 20 year old town house located on a picturesque tree lined street in Stuyvesant Heights, formally known as Bedford Stuyvesant.  A safe and racially diverse neighborhood.  There are markets, local shopping, pharmacy and popular fast food eateries within walking distance. The J train is located at the Halsey Street station - about a 5 minute walk from the house.  The A and C trains are located at the Ralph Avenue station - about a 10 minute walk from the house.  All transportation will get you to Manhattan in under 20 minutes.  Trains, taxi and buses run 24/7.  Relax in a clean room with wood floors, flat screen tv, blue ray dvd player, access to closets and dresser draws accented by modern decor.  Feel free to enjoy the comforts of a garden back yard space.  There will always be someone available to assist and/or answer any (Website hidden by Airbnb)  we can coordinate the time of your arrival ALSO I have a exterminator come monthly.

Many restaurants, cafes, bars, clubs, and shops to explore.  Close to Soho, Lower East Side, Little Italy. 7 min crosstown to west village. 15 min to Times Sq/theater district. Closest subway line is the  "L" line, one block away. Buses one block away New "citibank" public bike rentals on corner. Apartment has internet connection and wifi. Air conditioning in both living room and bedroom. Overall a wonderful and comfortable space to use as your home base for your stay in NYC.

name: Amazing Brownstone in Best Brooklyn
space: Beautiful triplex in 19th century townhouse on a tree-lined block in the heart of Carroll Gardens. Enjoy brownstone living at its finest: high-ceilinged parlor floor has a top-of-the-line, newly renovated architect-designed kitchen and great room with modern furnishings, south-facing living room, dining room, half bath and chef's kitchen opening onto a sunny garden and deck.  First floor has master bedroom, office and media room with full bath. Top floor has 3 bedrooms, laundry room and full bath. All modern amenities (cable TV, big screen home theater, high-speed wireless, central AC to beat the summer heat, washer/dryer, dishwasher). Our home is family friendly - enjoy our piano, games, bicycles, Xbox, or just sit on the front stoop and see the best of Brownstone Brooklyn pass by. name: Nice Manhattan Apt Near Central Park and Subway
space: Great Manhattan apartment only a block from Central Park and just a couple blocks from the Subway station. The apartment is located in a safe quiet neighborhood ideal for families and kids.  Apartment rental also includes the use of two bicycles with their own parking spot in the storage room.  The apartment can sleep a total of seven people with two in the master bedroom, three in the second bedroom and two on the fold out couch in the living room.   Apartment features include a washing machine/dryer combo, a 32" LCD TV with cable (HBO and Showtime included), High speed internet access/WiFi, printer, DVD/Blue Ray player with some movies to watch, cable, and air conditioning in each room.  The kitchen is fully equipped including pots and pans, dishes, utensils, microwave, stove/oven, toaster, water purifier, and dishwasher.  In the kitchen you will find also a washer/dryer. The bathroom has a shower/bathtub.  All towels and linens are included. The place is newly remodeled and updated

name: Private Stay In Peaceful Artist Apartment
space: Comfortable spare room in artist home. The room comfortably fits 1 adult, possibly 2  and we have a small spare mattress for a small child if needed. Only three blocks to the L or J train. We are offering a private room for rent in Bushwick, a full sized bed with linens and towels. This rental includes access to a kitchen, bathroom, and wifi. This room is good for 1- 2 adults and/or a child. Breakfast of oatmeal/cereal, eggs, fresh fruit, tea and coffee are included. The room is located near two subways stops ( Bushwick-Aberdeen L and Chauncey J) and is only one stop away from Broadway Junction; convenient for folks arriving and departing from JFK.  A few stops down the L you have the parts of Bushwick known for it's burgeoning art scene, so there are a lot galleries, music, dance and theater venues in the neighborhood to visit.  Our section of the neighborhood is very peaceful and a good place to rest after full days in the city. The apartment is wonderful and spacious for this city.

name: Cool & Spacious Harlem Artist Flat
space: ENJOY OUR LOVELY APARTMENT Our very large top floor 3 bedroom apartment in friendly South Harlem neighborhood, now being called “SOHA”, will be available for weeks at a time.  It is a comfortable, very spacious top floor apartment – the perfect space for an artist, musician or family looking to be conveniently close to everything in NYC but also able to “get away from it all”.  Our cool and funky flat is full of plants, artwork and music, with a large eat-in kitchen and hardwood floors throughout. We have hi-speed internet, wifi, flat screen TV with DVD/BluRay, A/C, elevator, and cool neighbors. The apartment can comfortably accommodate 4-5 guests. We have 2 bedrooms with double beds, and one kid's room with a single.  All beds are technically futons, but very comfortable ones with springs so they feel like a firm mattress. name: Sunny, quiet, legal homelike suite-Pk Slope South
space: Would you like to come home to a safe, family-oriented block in South Slope, Brooklyn? This second floor apartment consists of one large room (12x12) and a smaller room (10x10)  with a full bathroom and small  kitchenette. It is a private space, part of our duplex which is separate from the rest of the house.  For many out-of-towners it is small--New Yorkers think it is spacious.  This is a separate 'floor through' space with views to the back yard.  The space is private and entered with a key. The apartment is on the second floor separated from the rest of the house with many flexible features. (For Europeans and Australians, the second floor is up one flight of stairs.) The bathroom is cozy, and has a full shower,  and all the basics. The bathroom ensuite is in the big bedroom which is entered from the main hallway. name: Warehouse Loft with Garden view
space: If you are looking for a melting pot NY City experience in a up and coming, bohemian style neighborhood, this is your place!!! However, if you are looking for a 'Sex in the City' experience, this is not the right place for you.  This is a  beautiful well-lit loft apartment in a renovated warehouse, just like you see in the movies. High ceilings with exposed beams and polished cement flooring from the turn of the century (the other century).   It sleeps 5 easily with a queen bed, a sleeper couch, and an air bed for 2. There is 1 bathroom with a full bathtub, a kitchen that has anything you might need, plus staples like coffee, salt, sugar.  Wifi cable internet, Apple TV, and unlimited nation-wide calling on a land line. Located on a main street on the borders of Bedford Stuyvesant and Crown Heights sections of Brooklyn. The LIRR and Flatbush/Atlantic Terminal is within a few minutes walking distance from the house. Both national and international airports are convenient by car, taxi, subway or railroad. name: Elegant 2-BR duplex, Union Square
space: This spacious, elegant 2BR duplex with garden in Gramercy/Union Square is ideally located for NYC visiting and touring. The large master bedroom with king bed and 40" flat-screen TV and ensuite master bath gives onto the garden.    A second smaller bedroom next to the master, with an attached study, has a full-size futon bed, also with a view on the garden. Strong wi-fi network throughout the apartment. You will enjoy the elegant living room with 11-foot ceilings, tasteful furnishings (and a pull out sleeper couch), 42" TV; large formal dining room, and light-filled cook's kitchen and breakfast nook. The caretaker stays in the downstairs front bedroom with a private bath for herself, and has her own private entrance, and does not use the rest of the house except for the hall bathroom (next to her room). Owners will be based a little over an hour upstate (in Hopewell Junction, NY), in a 1759 coach house on 2+ acres on the Appalachian Trail, which is also for rent when we are traveling.

name: Cozy private family home in Bushwick
space: Chic and cozy 3 bedroom apartment in a private home on the border of Bedstuy and Bushwick Brooklyn. Suited for families with young children.  It is a large spacious duplex apartment with lots of natural light. On the first floor you have 1 bedroom with a queen bed, a full bathroom, large eat in kitchen and livingroom. Upstairs can be used as a private bedroom/ lounge/ office space.  There's a sofa, air mattresses available (1 Queen or 2 twin) Apartment is comfortably furnished and has all amenities needed for cooking, etc. The range is gas and there is central air conditioning throughout the home.  There is WIFI throughout the apartment. The J/Z Train is one block away and takes you to manhattan in a quick 30 mins.  It's a great neighborhood with great coffee shops, neighborhood bar, wine shop, great restaurants to dine in or to get delivery. There is street parking available in front of the house.

name: East Village bedroom w rooftop
space: Queen size futon mattress bed.  So comfy!! In 3 bedroom, with 2 cool roommates.  One girl, one boy. Your bedroom is lofted above the rest of the apartment, with a door to close for privacy, and has a sky light! Air conditioning.  Heat. Full bath. Quaint exposed brick and fun colored walls. Private rooftop deck right outside your bedroom window.  6th floor. !!Close to everything!!  1 block from the L train; 2 stops from Union Square.  East Village is one of the best neighborhoods for all kinds and prices of food, bars, live music, yoga classes, and downtown theater.  You can see a burlesque show every week right down the street! You even get a vintage bicycle to cruise the hood in style.  Lots of bike lanes surrounding for extra safety. Internet included We have no tv, no pets, no smoking.

name: Modern Garden Apartment in NYC
space: Welcome to this modern, newly renovated, private, 1 bedroom garden apartment located in Astoria, New York City. It is only a 1 minute walk to the train station, as it is located just around the corner. From there, it is only 10 minutes to reach Manhattan by train. The apartment is complete with modern furniture and fixtures throughout and is of a spacious, open-plan design, with ceramic tiled flooring. The apartment has a large living room with two comfortable sofas and a large flat-screen television with cable tv. There is a spacious kitchen with brand new appliances and is fully equipped to cook a gourmet meal. There is also a large dining table with dining chairs. The door in the kitchen will lead you to the large garden, which you will find a dining table, chairs, bench, 2 lounge chairs, and umbrella. What a treat to have an outdoor space in the city! The garden, with its quiet, serene environment, will put you in a relaxed state after a long, busy day around the high-energy city.

name: Large Luxury Upper East Side Studio
space: Located in the heart of the great Upper East Side neighborhood of Manhattan, this Large Alcove Studio was recently renovated with brand new stainless/granite kitchen with large breakfast bar and customized closets. The building features elevator, 24/hr doorman, roof access, laundry room in the basement of the building, newly renovated lobby… It is within a 1-minute walk from the subway line, Central Park, Museum Mile, and East River. The apartment is fully furnished with furniture; it has a separate sleeping area with a Queen-size bed, tall drawer chest and a night stand. The living room has a large flat-screen TV mounted on the wall, a Queen-size pullout sofa, a coffee table, and a dining table with 4 chairs. The bathroom has been recently renovated with stylish marble tiling. The apartment can accommodate maximum 2 people. Linen, blankets, towels, cookware/dishware, hairdryer are provided.

name: Lovely Brooklyn Brownstone 1BR!
space: My apt is a homey, comfortable, convenient place on the top floor of a charming Brooklyn brownstone. It has an open kitchen with adjoining dining area and living room. There is one bedroom available for Airbnb; a cozy, sunny guest room, very quiet, overlooking neighbors' gardens with a queen sized bed. The dining room and living room have an open floor plan. The dining area seats 6 at the table, and the bar seats three. The living room has a sofa, a love seat,  tv with Roku tv, and stereo. The newly renovated bathroom has a full-length shower stall. It is a typical Brooklyn brownstone apartment with original wood floors. There are ceiling fans throughout and air-conditioners (during the summer months) in the bedrooms to keep it cool.

name: Presence Guest Room - Chelsea NYC
space: Large furnished private bedroom available in NYC! Located in a beautiful brownstone in Chelsea on one of the most sought after tree lined blocks in Manhattan. You will be sharing a kitchen and dining room with me and my family. There is a beautiful tiled bathroom with shower dedicated to your use.  DISCLAIMER: If you are looking for a traditional B&B or a cheaper version of a hotel room, this may not be right for you. It is an old building with old fixtures and furniture, some of it a bit dog-eared. We are an Arts institute which hosts visiting artists in our family home, and sublets the extra bedrooms when visiting artists are not in residence. The townhouse also has a studio for classes screenings and readings, and a film production office. This historic artistic residence has hosted such luminaries as Tennessee Williams, Miles Davis and Allen Ginsberg. name: Spacious, Kid-Friendly, and 15-20 Mins. to Midtown
space: MY PLACE: The apartment and bedroom are very bright, quiet and spacious (the apartment is 1300 square feet total). The place is kept very clean at all times. My building was built in 1930 with many charming Art Deco elements, and has a modern elevator. I have a large kitchen for light cooking or a nice breakfast. To sleep, the bedroom has a fullsize bed and a fullsize cushion mattress (not air/blow-up) for the floor. PARKING: Free street parking in Sunnyside is easier to get than other parts of NYC. AMENITIES: I've lived in NYC for 30 years and know some of the best tips about the city and neighborhoods, so I'm your on-call concierge. ;-)  There is an elevator and a coin laundry is in the basement. Iron, hair dryer, and other home essentials. MY FAMILY: I've got a 5-year-old boy who loves people and other children. He has lots of toys to share. We'd love to have you join us!

If needed, the building also has a laundry room with plenty of washers and dryers on the first floor.  The bedroom has high speed internet, cable television and Hulu. name: Cheerful, comfortable room
space: Bedroom in Manhattan's Washington Heights, 2 doors from subway. Very near the Cloisters ,Harlem and other upper Manhattan historic sights. Attractive, clean and safe. Linens,blankets and bath towels provided. 3 subway stops from Columbia university, walking distance of Columbia medical school.A short bus ride will get you to the Cloisters. My neighborhood now ranks higher  than Soho and the Village for safety. There are 3 churches and a high school on my block. It is an area that has a combination of having deep traditions as well going through exciting changes.  I am a life coach who works from home and lives with 2 feline companions. I am equal parts homebody and world traveler. In the last year I have visited Bali and Costa Rica. I am looking to provide short term stays and a comfortable place for you to rest after your adventures in the Big Apple.

name: Serene Park Slope Garden Apartment
space: Our one bedroom "floor through" garden apartment is on a tree-lined street in the heart of Park Slope.  With white walls, hard wood floors, marble mantels, tin ceilings and simple contemporary furniture, it will appeal to your modern aesthetic. The living room opens onto a peaceful garden with a bluestone and brick patio for outdoor dining (and can sleep one adult (two, in a pinch) on the sofa-bed).  The large bedroom has a queen-sized bed with white Egyptian cotton sheets and lovely original details.  Amenities include a Bosch dishwasher and a microwave oven in a fully-equipped kitchen, along with wi-fi and cable TV.  If you're traveling with a baby, we can provide a "Pack'n Play" infant bed.   This apartment is in our family's brownstone, and we will be here to assist you during your stay. You will have private access to the apartment through your own separate entrance.

name: Sunny Space in Williamsburg
space: The guest room has a full size bed, ac (in window during summer), wifi, tv with dvd player and roku for streaming (netflix), and a radio alarm watch with an ipod console. It is a former fabric factory building, so the heat has one control for the entire building. If there is too much heat, the easiest way is to open the windows, even that that is not good for the environment. If the heat is not enough, I can call the super. There is also an electric radiator in the room. This used to be my year round home, but now I am working as an agency nurse in New Haven, which means short term contracts away from home. The two other bedrooms in the apartment are now occupied by my roommates/friends Casey and Jen. (shared bathroom) And my cat, Pys. Jen and Casey are taking care of Pys when I am away. Pys sometimes acts up and does not use the litter box. While I was told by guests who have cats that 'cats will be cats', I know that it can be a problem. space: Small one bedroom garden apartment with a nice sized backyard on a safe, landmark, tree-lined block of Clinton Hill, Brooklyn. 1 block to PRATT Institute (across the street from Higgins Halll), and a 15 minute subway ride to lower Manhattan. The G train at Clinton-Washington is around the corner and the C train is 3 blocks away. Your choice of restaurants and services are nearby on DeKalb Avenue and Fulton Street. Fort Greene Park and BAM (the Brooklyn Academy of Music) are a leisurely 15 min walk away. The apartment is in a two-family brick home and has wood flooring, tasteful furnishings, exposed brick and a  non-working fireplace. The kitchen and living room are separated by a small flight of stairs as is the living room and bedroom, which gives the apartment an added feeling of spaciousness. name: Sunny Bushwick Loft
space: A sunny clean 600 sq ft loft in Bushwick with 14ft high ceilings and a sunny southern exposure. Two massive windows bring in lots of light. The queen size bed sits on a loft with windows and is super comfortable.  There is an AC, fan, and heat . The shower pressure is strong. The kitchen has all the right stuff. It's got a great homey feeling. There is fast internet and wifi. I like my place clean and make sure its spotless for guests.  I know and love all my neighbors in the building - they are good friends, good neighbors, and are good help in a jam. The loft is on the top floor with roof access and sunset views of Manhattan.

The apartment is quite big, you would share it with a girl in her late 30's, a busy graphic designer/illustrator and her small, sweet cat. name: Cozy&Clean By Prospect Pk * NYC in 5 stops!
space: Great new restaurants and bars in the hood. There are plenty of food options near  - Chinese, Indian, Italian downstairs, and grocery store, liquor store and laundry are all across the street! 4th floor of a walkup. Its a large, 3 bedroom, with shared a shared bathroom & Kitchen. I live in the unit and rent out the other two rooms. Each room has a bed for 2  and a third guest can sleep on the couch in the living room or air matress! Iron, blow dryer, power adapter and just about most things you may need. I am mature, fun and easy going but also very responsible - I actually host because I like to take care of people and this is a way for me to extend a bit of hospitality.  I have always subleased to Europeans so I am very comfortable with foreigners and see it as an opportunity to study other languages. There has never been a problem for anyone coming home on the train late at night and a taxi from midtown will run you about 25 dollars.

name: Sunny, Large, Park Slope Bedroom
space: Imagine a quiet bedroom in a spacious apartment, with beautiful sunlight, just steps from the terrific restaurants and shops of this wonderful neighborhood.  Near many subway stops (1/2 block from the R train), easy to get to Manhattan; four blocks from Prospect Park; near to the Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Museum.  You'll have the best of both worlds: you'll be in a fun, hip, laid-back neighborhood, but close to the sights and action of Manhattan! The apartment is a duplex with two large bedrooms, two full baths, fully stocked kitchen, dw, wi-fi.  You would be sharing the place with me (and my cat) - I'm in the upstairs bedroom and have my own bathroom, you have the downstairs bedroom (double bed; there is a queen-size raised aerobed if you prefer) and bathroom, and we share the open living/kitchen/dining area.   I'd greatly appreciate it if you would make an inquiry so we can e-chat for a bit before sending an offer.  Thanks!

name: Ideal Brooklyn Brownstone Apartment
space: Welcome to Brooklyn! Modern, fully furnished  brownstone apartment in Stuyvesant Heights, Brooklyn  hidden  "jewel."  This ideal location accommodates 3 guests comfortably and offers convenient travel to Manhattan, Park Slope, Brooklyn Heights, Williamsburg or any other part of New York City via car, subway or bus. The apartment is walking distance (3 blocks) to the subway (A,C lines) supermarket, fresh fruit vegetable markets and several Zagat rated restaurants and lounges.   If driving, there is plenty of street parking available. Guests will find all of the comforts and amenities of home, including hardwood floors, towels/linen, a full kitchen, office space, wifi, cable TV, A/C and a comfortable queen sized bed.  The apartment also includes a full sleeper sofa. It's the ideal spot to call home while vacationing, on business or just exploring and passing through.  Any questions?  Feel free to email me. name: Central Bedford Avenue Apartment
space: This fully furnished 1-bedroom railroad apartment is located in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn, just one subway stop away from Manhattan.  You'll be renting the entire apartment, located on the first floor of a walk up. The apartment is perfect for a single traveler or a couple. It features one bedroom with a Queen size bed. The kitchen is equipped with a full size refrigerator, a gas stove, coffee maker and all cookware/dishware you'll need for entertaining. Towels, linens and internet access are included.  Located on Bedford Avenue in Williamsburg, and right across the street from McCarren Park. The neighborhood is safe and lively, steps away from some of Brooklyn's best restaurants, bars, art galleries and trendy shops.  By public transportation, Manhattan is only 1 subway stop away from the nearby Bedford Avenue L line.  Please message us with any questions!

name: East Village House -- Unique!
space: NOTE:  Memorial weekend is special pricing for nurse (male or female) or nurse types who can administer insulin to Mugsy, one of the kitty boys who now has diabetes!  Thanks! One of the coolest spots in Manhattan, this is a bizarrely quiet and serene little cottage in the middle of the East Village of NYC.  It's 2 blocks from Tompkins square, but this house is for cat lovers only!  That's because 4 cute cats live here that you need to feed twice daily (these are otherwise independent cats that spend most of their time outdoors!).  Other than this requirement, this is one unique place that is close to everything cool that is New York.  It's funky, so if you're used to 5 star hotels, beware.  But if you'd rather be in a quiet and charming 2 story cottage with a toasty fireplace and a large front yard to enjoy your morning coffee, then you've come to the right spot. name: Artsy Loft-like Harlem Apartment
space: The apartment is in a prewar walk-up, built at the turn of the century.  It has all of the hallmarks of that period - fireplaces, high ceilings, beautiful woodwork, and even a dumbwaiter (now converted into a cupboard).  The apartment is fully furnished, with eclectic but primarily modern furniture.  The bedroom has a very comfortable full sized bed - perfect for one or two people.  The eat-in kitchen has exposed brick and two large windows. and opens to the living room.  The kitchen has amenities including a dishwasher, washing machine, large stainless steel refrigerator,  microwave, fully equipped cooking and eating utensils, and hard wood floors made of reclaimed barn wood.  The living room has a fireplace, and is extremely quiet, comfortable, and has great light in the mornings.  I live in the apartment with my 8 year old daughter, who is very friendly and loves having guests!!  Don't worry - the apartment is 70' long and the bedrooms are far apart, so there is plenty of privacy.

name: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT, GREAT LOCATION
space: Beautiful 1st floor spacious and furnished two bedroom apartment in the heart of Boerum Hill. Only 2 blocks away from the  famous Smith Street for the best dining and bar experiences in Brooklyn, if not New York City. The property is located on a beautiful tree-lined street in a prime Brooklyn location on Dean and Bond, with plenty of cafés and great spots to dine and drink at any time. The apartment is furnished with a queen bed in the master bedroom and a double bed in the side bedroom and a sofa in the living room. The  kitchen comes fully stocked and the bathroom has a full bathtub and shower. In addition, the apartment has cable TV and internet connection. Boerum Hill and neighboring Cobble Hill and Carroll Gardens are well known for fabulous restaurants on Smith Street (restaurant row), great shopping, cafes and antique stores. Well known artists and actors live in the area as well. It is a few blocks to the F/2/3/4/5/B/D/Q trains which take 10 - 15 minutes to get into the city.

name: Beautiful Brownstone
space: Need an ideal for place for weekend getaways or extended layovers. Are you in the city for business and looking for a place to stay that is close to Manhattan without having to pay enormous hotel fees. Maybe you are a vacationing family who are tired of sleeping on the floor or those hard pull out couches. Perhaps you are a married couple trying to escape the in-laws or trying to have a romantic stay in a short term lodge. If this sounds like you or if it doesnt and you just want to stay in a scenic part of Brooklyn, New York I welcome you to stay in my beautiful Brownstone Apartment. This 1200 sq ft apartment, on a tree lined block in Bedford Stuyvessant, comes furnished with 2 queen size beds. A sleeper sofa in the living room. A fully equipped kitchen with coffee maker, microwave and full size refrigerator. In the bathroom there is a spa sized bath tub along with a seperate standing shower. name: LES private apt, 1 bedroom & more
space: This clean 1 bedroom, 2nd floor apartment is in the middle of everything. A few more blocks brings you to all the dive bars, night clubs, and cultural destinations downtown Manhattan has to offer - but you're far enough away to have a quiet night if you want to. Situated in the Lower East Side, you are walking distance to the East Village, Soho, West Village and Chinatown.  Easy access to the J/M/Z and F/B/D, 6, and N/R trains.  2 blocks from the Williamsburg bridge for easy access to Williamsburg and other neighborhoods in Brooklyn.   The apartment is newly renovated with a kitchen separate from the bedroom and living room.  The bedroom gets lots of sunlight, and the living room has a small love seat that folds out to sleep 2 additional people.

Plenty of fresh towels and linens, 1875 watt hair dryer, complimentary hotel toiletries. name: Lower East Side/Chinatown 1 Bedroom
space: Small one-bedroom apartment on Ludlow Street.  Great location, close to Chinatown, walking distance to nearly everything downtown.  There is a small park a block away.  Dozens of great restaurants around. The Lower East Side bars and clubs are two blocks north.  LES is the best neighborhood in Manhattan hands down!  Lots of new art galleries have opened over the past year.  Thankfully it stays very calm on my block, an elementary school is across the street.   The apartment does not face the street, so it is very quiet.  Close to F/M/J and B/D subway lines.  Apartment is in an old tenement building that just underwent renovations in the hallway.   Living room and kitchen are in one room, bedroom is adjacent with a full-sized bed.  In a not-to-odd for NY arrangement, the toilet is in an small enclosed room off the bedroom and the shower is located in another small enclosed room off the kitchen. The kitchen sink is the only sink.  Good for one or two people.  2nd Floor of the building, n

name: Spacious & Charming by Prospect Pk
space: This lovely pre-war apartment is in a building from 1939 and contains: kitchen foyer (with table for eating) living room/bedroom bathroom (with shower and bathtub) The kitchen was fully renovated, floor to ceiling, in summer 2018 and contains all new appliances.   The bathroom was renovated in summer 2018 and has great light, a newly glazed bathtub (for those with long legs) and nice shower, sink and toilet. The living room/bedroom is "sunken" (with 2 stairs from the foyer). It was recently painted in summer 2018 and contains a couch perfect for reading or napping, a projector (perfect for watching movies). There's wireless internet (wifi). Next to the couch is a super-comfortable queen-sized bed. There's an air-conditioner and a nice art deco dresser for your use. There's not much noise, as the apartment faces the rear of the building. There's a part-time doorperson who takes packages and there are laundry machines in the basement of the building. People in the building are friendly,

name: Astoria Garden Suite
space: (Description en Espanol hacia abajo.) Staying in the North End of Astoria - Ditmars Blvd. train station area is the best for those who are looking to enjoy what it is like to live in a Village type atmosphere. Plenty of restaurants, beer gardens, lounges, cafes and yoga studios to keep you busy. If you are here to spend most of your days in Manhattan then Ditmars Blvd. - Astoria Queens is the way to go. It is the first stop of the N or Q line, you will always have a seat on the train at this station and the best part is that because it is the first stop there are always 2 trains at the station so no need to stand on the platform in the heat, rain, cold or snow while waiting for the train.  The other advantage to being at Ditmars is that the trains run Express during rush hour so you bypass all the other people waiting at the other stations. The train ride is 12 minutes to 59th Street & Lexington Ave - Midtown. Our place is 5 blocks & 1 avenue from the train station and is always busy s

Living room: Perfect for relaxing, entertaining a guest. Queen-sized leather sofabed Eames lounge chair Flatscreen TV with stereo receiver, speakers. A/C in living room; fan in bedroom.  Bedroom: Queen-sized bed on extremely comfortable mattress. Bathroom: Full bath/shower. Linens provided if you launder them. (Nearby laundromats will wash, fold & deliver.)  Kitchen: Small, but complete. Full fridge, stove, microwave. Capuccino maker, toaster, blender, juicer. Wireless, Basic TV channels Location, Location, Location: IDEAL Steps from Gramercy Park, Flatiron, Murray Hill. Fine dining. East River Promenade. Easy walk to East Village, Downtown, and Times Square. 30 minutes on R/W and 6 trains, crosstown bus to almost anywhere including Downtown Brooklyn or Downtown. . . Queens. name: Quality Cozy Studio Next to Subway
space: Sunny, immaculate fully furnished studio with queen sized bed, brand new wood floor and desk furniture.  The unit is on the 2nd floor of a multi-family two story home in a safe, quiet and convenient Queens neighborhood.  Studio apartment has been impeccably renovated with new wood floors.  It has its own PRIVATE entrance & PRIVATE bathroom.  There is no kitchen but the unit has a mini-fridge & a microwave oven. Eight (8) minute walk to the M & R subway lines (Grand Avenue Subway Station located on Queens Blvd & Grand Avenue).  25 minutes by subway to most of Manhattan. $28 taxi ride or $32 Uber to JFK International Airport. 10 minute drive to LaGuardia. Walking distance to shopping, groceries, restaurants and parks. Lots of international ethnic restaurants, grocery stores & a 12 minute walk to Queens Center Shopping Mall with Target, Best Buy, Macy's, etc. WiFi and utilities are included. Street parking available for passenger vehicles.

name: Scandinavian-apt for up to 5. LES
space: The apartment is a 2 bedrooms, high ceilings, airly with nice daylight. It is newly renovated with delicate, scandanivian interior. There is a flat screen tv to accompany your dinners, if you ever do actually decide to cook in the city that never sleeps.  Room 1 is small, as shown in the pictures. It has a Sleeping couch that is the size of a queen size bed.   Room 2 is lager and has more space. Also has a sleeping couch but a newer model than in the picture. It folds out to become a queen size bed too.  If you end up booking for more than 4 people, there is an additional airbed that can be used.  It is however, a fifth floor walk up. That comes with a view of Empire State Building (otherwise not visible at lower floors)! There is no elevator, so sorry! There is a laundromat right next door where you can drop off your laundry! name: Brownstone comfort + beautiful yard
space: Welcome to our Park Slope, Brooklyn home - only 15 minutes on the subway to Manhattan, tons of trains within walking distance, 2 blocks to New York's greatest park (yes, I think  Prospect Park is better than Central Park), big kitchen, comfortable living room, a backyard to relax in... and (if it's alright for me to say so) one of the friendliest hostesses you can find. name: Loft Suite @ Box House Hotel
space: Loft Suites @ The Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. These loft units feature 16ft ceilings, kitchenettes, and translucent glass block wall giving ample light. Fully equipped with everything you need for your stay. The studio loft has an alcove bedroom area with a comfortable queen size bed and a pull out sofa in the living room area, which in total can easily sleep up to 4 guests. The loft is equipped with HD TVs in both the living and bedroom areas with premium cable channels. There are hardwood floors throughout and a full bathroom with shower/tub combination.

name: 4 BEDROOM -2BATHRM WEST VILLAGE DUPLEX  TOWNHOUSE
space: Listed here is an entire 4 bedroom duplex in the heart of the West Village, Manhattan. The apartment is on the top 2 floors of an 1870's school house.  Its spacious, clean, gets great natural light and is professionally decorated.  The layout of the apartment is works well for larger groups.  Each of the 2 floors has 1 bathroom and 2 bedrooms so there is ample privacy and space.  All of the bedrooms have double beds.   The first floor has a large kitchen with a table that can seat 12. Upstairs is the living rom with 14ft vaulted ceilings and sky-lights. I have lived here for years and take great pleasure in calling this apartment home when I am in New York. Each bedroom is fully furnished and have full closets.  The kitchen is stocked with all your cooking needs     -Apple TV  on Flat Screen TV -High Speed WIFI -equipped kitchen,  toaster, coffee machine,  hot plate , pots/pans, dinner plates, bowls, drinking glasses, etc) -Beds sheets, towels, and other linens will be provided.  -Loca

name: Large & bright 900ft² 1br in WV
space: Super large fully furnished one bedroom apartment with sofa and dining table. Top floor. The apartment is very spacious, lots of light (2 large windows in bedroom, 3 large windows plus sky light in living room). Full equipped kitchen with granite counter top and stainless steel appliances. Apartment equipped with king size bed, bed linens, towels, sheets, kitchenware, coffee maker, microwave.  Super large sofa, could sleep another 1-2 people. Blow up sofa also available. Also includes: internet, large flat screen TV (Time Warner Cable, 1000+ channels and on demand. Additionally: Netflix and Hulu+, etc. Surrounded with all fine and trendy restaurants (Extra Virgin, Waverly Inn, Morandi, Tertulia,.., and stores (Marc Jacobs, Gant, Reiss, Freemans Sporting Club, James Perse,..). space: Please read the entire profile.  *PREFER FEMALES ONLY Thank you!!! name: The Lenox in Harlem
space: This beautiful, spacious apartment is just 4 blocks from the 2/3 express train. Building has 24 hour doorman, free gym, and rooftop terrace with grill. name: Heart & Soul of Greenwich Village
space: Perfectly situated in Manhattan's legendary Greenwich Village: a truly unique 4 bed/1 bath, giant sun-drenched loft space with 20-foot ceilings, full-kitchen/dining area, washer/dryer, and private outdoor rooftop garden terrace complete with outdoor heated shower, and skyline view.  Step from the bustling street energy in one of New York City's most vibrant and trendy neighborhoods into a quiet oasis of calm, comfort and class. It's the ultimate New York living experience: the city is at your doorstep, but the sound stays behind.  Just steps from all subway transportation, historic Washington Square Park, NYU's Main Campus, Bleecker Street, the world-renowned "The Blue Note" jazz club, and several other notable fine dining, nightlife and entertainment options. You will not find a better location! name: Classic Tribeca Loft/ 5 star reviews w Elevator
space: This large 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment was completely renovated.  Master Bath has en suit bathroom with spa like rainfall and body sprays. Living Room/  Kitchen is modern and open with 12 foot high ceilings and cast iron columns reminding you of Tribeca's history.  Elevator in building.  Washer / Dryer in the unit.  If you need additional cleaning services or food deliveries for an extended stay that can be arranged on your behalf.   Apartment is large but to minimize wear and tear I'm limiting to 5 people maximum. Neighborhood is one of the City's best for restaurants with Scalini Fedeli, Mr. CHOW's, Tribeca Grill and countless other great restaurants steps from your door. name: Prime Williamsburg Loft off Bedford
space: Settle into your own private room and work space in a spacious and stylish loft on one of the best blocks in the Burg. Ideal location - just a 3-minute walk from the Bedford stop on the L train, which will get you to Union Square in Manhattan in 5 minutes. You can also catch the East River Ferry from the nearby North 6th Pier.  On North 9th St., you are in the center of it all but still on a quiet, tree-lined block. The high street of Bedford Avenue is two short blocks away, and one block in the other direction is gorgeous East River State Park. You’ll be perfectly positioned to take in the neighborhood’s countless cool bars, restaurants, boutiques and events.  As for the space, the loft is on the 3rd floor of a former factory building. In all it is approximately 1,100 square feet (102M sq.), with 12-foot (3.6M) ceilings throughout, a huge common living room space with Manhattan and Brooklyn views, and a massive roof deck with sweeping views of the East River and Manhattan skyline. name: Whole apartment / 2 bedroom in NYC
space: Welcome!  Whole apartment for rent in a spacious fully furnished, 2 bedroom apartment located on 112th street between Park and lexington avenues. 2 bedrooms with shared bath, separate living room and separate dinning room area.  Two bedrooms each with a double bed that can accommodate 4 people. The apartment is on the top floor of an elevator building. The building also has washer/dryer located on the first floor along with 2 courtyards. The apartment is located just 2 short blocks away from the 6 local train located on 110th street and lexington avenue, makes it very convenient to visit the city and also a 5 minute walk to central Park. This apartment is very spacious, bright with natural lighting and quiet. Being so close to the subway and with the apartment features and its space, this rental Ideal for your stay here in NYC!

name: Private Bdrm /Bath 1 block Ctrl Prk
space: Beautiful spacious apt in a prewar building.  My apartment is located on the 5th floor of a pre-war building on 86th Street .  Central Park is just one block away and the apt is in an area that is walking distance to many of the city's attractions-The Metropolitan Museum of Art is walking distance through Central Park, The Museum of Natural History is only a few blocks away, and Lincoln Center is just a few bus or subway stops away.  The subway is less than two blocks away, and the crosstown bus in right on the corner. There are plenty of good restaurants, bars, and shopping in the area. Private bedroom and private bathroom. Fresh towels, sheets, comforters provided. Queen size bed. Wireless and tv also available.

name: Chez Carine - Privacy in Manhattan
space: My 2nd floor apartment (no elevator), fully furnished with its own distinctive decor, offers an eclectic and peaceful retreat from which guests can explore the proximity of local attractions in Manhattan as well as discovering other boroughs of the City that NEVER sleeps: NYC! The private room is VERY spacious  so you will not be disappointed at all. I cater to the non-smoking, cosmopolitan, and urban traveler and family from out of town. THE APARTMENT IS: • on a brownstone tree-lined street • located in  Harlem in Manhattan • 15/20 minutes from Times Square • near cozy restaurants (Yatenga, Chez Lucienne, Corner Social Red Rooster, Harlem Beer Garden....), cool bars (Shrine, Lenox Lounge SoCo....), supermarkets, laundromat, drugstore  Supermarket and 24/7 laundromat are right across the corner street.  I also have PLENTY of tour guides of NYC (one in French and rest in English) in case you forget yours!!!

space: "I had a wonderful time in New York City. The room at Taylor & Grace's apartment is spacious, very clean and makes you feel being at home. The area is just great, close to subway trains, you can go for runs in Prospect Park and have all kinds of restaurants and shops close by. I highly recommend this place for your stay in NY." Olaf from Germany writes. On the 4th floor of a secure (walk-up) apartment building, your private room comes with  - a comfy, twin bed  - desk and chair and  - armoire for clothes. The flat is in the back of the building so it is quiet. A bathroom and living room is shared with the host. Kitchen use is available for vegetarian foods please. Other amenities include wireless internet, coin operated washer and dryer in the basement and air conditioning. Note: we do not have a landline phone, television set or microwave. Located in what the New York Magazine calls the "BEST PLACE TO LIVE" in NYC, North Park Slope, just a few blocks from the B/Q and 2/3 trains.  - go

name: Large 1 Bedroom furnished on UWS
space: I have a very nice 1 bedroom available for the Holidays on the Upper West Side at Broadway and low 100's. Available in advance for any dates.  If interested please email me for dates, I will try to accommodate only with advance notice.    The apartment is within walking distance to Riverside Park. name: Loft Suite @ Box House Hotel
space: Loft Suites @ The Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. These loft units feature 16ft ceilings, kitchenettes, and translucent glass block wall giving ample light. Fully equipped with everything you need for your stay. The studio loft has an alcove bedroom area with a comfortable queen size bed and a pullout sofa in the living room area, which in total can easily sleep up to 4 guests. The loft is equipped with 42” LCD HD TVs in both the living and bedroom areas with premium cable channels. There are hardwood floors throughout and a full bathroom with shower/tub combination.

name: Husband & Wife Art-Filled Apartment
space: Comfy 1 bedroom apartment in convenient, charming Fort Greene, Brooklyn. I'm a filmmaker. My wife is a writer and musician. Our house is filled with art, books, movies, comfortable vintage furniture.  We love to cook, so the kitchen is well stocked. The house is warm, tidy, and gets a lot of light. We have one double bed and a pair of long couches that can make a nice bed.  The building is friendly and there are great neighborhoods all around, with restaurants, bars, cafes, all sorts of shopping, parks, greenmarkets and more. In Fort Greene, near Clinton Hill, Park Slope, Prospect Heights. 15 minutes to Lower Manhattan, Williamsburg, Cobble Hill, Carroll Gardens. Half a block to the C train, 8 minutes to the 2, 3, 4, 5, N, Q, R, B, D, G.  WiFi included. Stereo with speakers in both rooms. name: Alchemy BnB - room in artist loft
space: I have a small room (8x13 feet) in my loft where I live and work, in the Cobble Hill section of Brooklyn.  The bathroom is shared with me.  It’s centrally located within three to four blocks of the F, G, R, 2, 3, 4, 5, A, and C trains, and a ten minute walk to the foot of the Brooklyn Bridge. It is located in one the trendiest neighborhoods in Brooklyn, complete with fabulous restaurants, watering holes, and shops!   Brooklyn Bridge Park is only four blocks from my front door.  Barclay's Center is less than a 20 minute walk from my place.  It has a brand new (March 2019) queen sized bed, a small frig, and electric kettle to make coffee or tea. There’s wireless internet, hairdryer, and iron with ironing board for your use. The room faces a busy thoroughfare, and can be a little noisy at times, a fact of life in an urban environment!  To remedy this, I have equipped the room with a white noise machine and earplugs for those who are light sleepers.  In the summer that is less of an issue

name: Sunny! 2br Steps to train/restaurants - 15 to NYC
space: Walk less than a one minute to the subway, ride 15 and you'll be in Manhattan! Subway right around the corner! Visitors can save the long walks for checking out the city rather than hiking to the train. Also, it’s a convenient train to take to/from the JFK airport (total cost $7.25, transit time about 45 minutes). This sunny (two skylights) apartment has hardwood floors, a tub/shower bathroom, living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. Street parking is not as competitive as other parts of the city. I often get to park right in front of the apartment. The master bedroom has a queen size bed, cotton sheets, boosted WiFi, bath towels, closet with shelving and hangers for clothing, and full length mirror + loads of charm. name: Zen Den (Airport Pickup: JFK & LGA)
space: --Welcome-- I'm a live-in host renting out the 'Zen Den' of this spacious attic apartment.  The Zen Den is in a cozy alcove near the front entrance of the apartment.  You can close off the space with curtains for privacy.  We've worked hard to create an unique space that is engaging as well as relaxing. If you book the Zen Den, then Zen Eyrie will be blocked during the dates you book.  This way, you will be my only guests during your booking dates. Check out my other listing, ZEN EYRIE: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/265064 --Amenities-- Guests will get the Zen Den to themselves for their stay.  You'll be provided a warm hospitality, including fresh towels and bed sheets.  You're welcome to buy food and cook in the kitchen if you tidy up and clean. name: Cozy 2 Bedroom 20 Min from City
space: Beautiful renovated 2 bedroom apartment, nestled on a quiet block on the edge of Clinton Hill/BedStuy.  The neighborhood is rich in culture and foot steps away from Clinton Hills, Fort Greene, downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan. The neighborhood offers a cozy coffee shop (Civil Service) three short blocks away and three full service restaurants (the Black Swan, Pilar and Coladors) four-five blocks away. The "G" train is three blocks away at the Bedford/Nostrand or four blocks to the Myrtle/Willoughby train stops.  In fifteen to twenty minutes with a connection to the "L" you can be in the city and get off on the East or West side of Manhattan. If you want to stay above ground and ride the bus to downtown Brooklyn, the B38 and B44 are a block away.  You can also walk 4 short blocks over to Myrtle Ave. and jump on the B54 and ride down Myrtle Ave. and jump off at any of the many restaurants, bars, stores and coffee shops along the way. name: 2 bedroom apt in charming brick townhouse
space: Our 2 bedroom apartment is located on the first floor of a recently renovated, century-old brick townhouse.  It has wood floors throughout, exposed brick, original tin ceilings, tub/shower in bathroom, kitchen alcove, living room and two bedrooms.  Downstairs is an open plan finished basement with a washer/dryer and a Queen-sized sleeper sofa for extra sleeping space. We also have a lovely private backyard, and street parking if you are traveling by car. Located between the neighborhoods of DUMBO and Fort Greene, you are a 10 minute walk from either neighborhood with lots of shops and restaurants.  Across the street is Commodore Barry Park, Brooklyn's first park.  It was recently renovated and features an open area with lots of trees and benches directly across from the apartment, sports fields on the far side of the park, and a free public lap pool open all summer long.

name: Luxury light-filled designer space in Soho
space: Building:  Beautiful renovated loft in an old loft space with elegant and very comfortable European furniture, ideal for a single person or couple looking for a very special Manhattan stay. A downtown gem and a true New York experience, it's a classic loft where you have the top floor of a private building to yourself. It's a two-floor steep walkup, with old ceiling beams, exposed brick walls and great light from both directions --  unheard of in most downtown New York apartments. It's very open in both directions with no blocking buildings - you can even see the top of the Empire State Building all the way uptown at night. It's an old house with nooks and corners - that's what makes it a stunning and unusual place, and very New York. Extremely clean and well kept, and with the quirks of an old building. space: 1 Bedroom @ The Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. name: Resort-like living in Williamsburg
space: THE APARTMENT: Rent  a 2 bdrm/2 bathroom with furnished balcony, new condo development ((website hidden)). The building has a doorman, gym, pool, spa, sauna, and amazing meditation garden. The apartment is a corner unit with park views and a giant balcony. The apartment is fully furnished and feels like a home.  THE NEIGHBORHOOD: Williamsburg Brooklyn (I think the description says Greenpoint, but it's Williamsburg, east of Bedford Ave - the main strip in Williamsburg). There are PLENTY of incredible restaurants, bars, and clubs nearby. There's a park across the street from the apartment (Cooper Park) - it has a track, tennis courts, and dog park). You'll be 3 blocks from the L train which gets you to Manhattan in a few short minutes, and to mid-town or up town in 20-30 minutes.

name: One stop from Midtown Manhattan!
space: Private bedroom, SHARED bathroom in a clean, 2-bedroom apartment located on the 2nd floor (up 2 short flights of stairs). There's no elevator. The kitchen and a living room area separate the two bedrooms, so there is plenty of privacy. name: Easy, comfortable studio in Midtown
space: I live right on the corner of 46th and Lexington, which is just a few blocks south of the Waldorf, the W and the Intercontinental which I'm sure charge large multiples of what I'm asking for less convenience. Original hardwood floors throughout. Wi-fi along with sheets and towels are all included. Located off the Winthrop stop on the 2 or 5 trains which are 1 block away. Or you can walk a few more blocks to the Q train at the Parkside stop. The B44 stops just outside the building. Super close to the amazing Prospect Park and Botanical Gardens.  There are a couple great coffeeshops nearby including the farm-to-table Starliner Cafe. There's also Gratitude Cafe, Gratitude Cake Shop, and Desserts by Michael Allen. There's the brewery Island to Island one block away. Street Sweeper is also a few blocks away with great Italian food. If you go to Pa

space: Amazing space and light!  Enjoy an exceptional space in NYC---bright, sun-filled, open, tastefully appointed,  with original art, back deck and garden. name: Cozy & Charming Boerum Hill Flat
space: Hi Guys, I'm in Boerum, Hill, or Gowanus, which is the new 'cool' neighbourhood. Meaning, a bit run down with edgy art stuff popping up everywhere. The block I'm on is not a nice one, but It's a few minutes walk from lots of nice ones - including Smith St, which everyone knows about and is filled with restaurants, cafes's shops and bars. The stairs in my building are not pretty, but my apartment is. It's a cute one bedroom, the bedroom is pretty small, and it's 5 mins from the lively Smith St where you spend 10 mins on the train to Manhattan. Close to practically all subways in NYC - (123, 456, ABC, QR, F, G )  between 5 - 10 mins walk to all of these.)  A cheap and comfortable option for a convenient and fun stay in NYC. I'm a great host!! I'm friendly and will want you to be comfortable. Ciao chickens.

name: Amazing West Village 2br
space: The apartment is a 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment on the 6th floor of an elevator building with large south-facing windows providing a nice view and great light. The master bedroom has a king bed with a very comfortable organic latex mattress, and the 2nd bedroom has a crib and a twin bed with an organic latex mattress. This apartment is perfect for a couple with 1-2 children. There's a dishwasher, microwave, fully appointed cooking kitchen, A/C, wifi, apple TV (HBO, netflix, hulu, etc), amazing sound system, blackout shades in the bedrooms, and a standing desk. There's a highchair, crib, plenty of toys and the apartment has been professionally baby-proofed. There's even a fancy water filter on the kitchen sink and on the showerhead, there are HEPA air filters in every room, there's a squatty potty, and there's a Japanese Toto toilet bidet, in case that's your thing :).

name: QT STUDIO FOR ROMANTIC COUPLES
space: Hello.  I had a bit of trouble with airbnb and my last guest, hence why I had to cancel my last two bookings.   This lovely light filled studio apartment is located on the best block in Chinatown / LES.  It is where you will want to be on your next trip to the city.  The apartment, with one large bathroom, full kitchen with a simple and minimal style, accommodates 2 people.  It has good heating in winter and great air con in summer.  You have the option of having the fridge well stocked (extra fee) with supplies to make your arrival comfortable and easy.  You won't need too much, you'll be out and about in New York all day and night! Please note the reviews below are for a room I used to rent in a loft.  I moved into this studio in May 2011 - I assure you its a whole apartment.  There are wonderful restaurants, coffee shops, stores, galleries and music venues at your doorstep.  I leave you with  great list of places to eat, have the best coffee in NY (thats my thing) and where you can

name: Park Slope Brooklyn!  Sunny Bedroom.
space: OUR PLACE: "The Best Kept Secret in Park Slope!" writes a recent guest.  Ideally situated on First St, in the heart of trendy Park Slope close to 5th Avenue, we offer a freshly painted sunny bedroom on the top floor of our 1888 one family brownstone.  The light filled room overlooks a quiet tree lined street.  Guests have their own entrance to the house “up the stoop” (at the second floor level).  Although the third floor guests rooms are separated from the family space, there is no division from our family home.  Please be aware that we have a steep but carpeted staircase with a solid bannister to the top floor. There is a spacious bathroom with an extra wide mirror and double hand basins, hair dryer and radio. A separate toilet room with small hand basin.  Both are private for guest use only. name: Cozy, Clean Cobble Hill Brownstone
space: This beautiful and spacious Garden apartment takes up an entire floor of our 1880s brownstone.  It has its own backyard which is great for summertime bbqing.  The backyard/garden is shared with me and my family - if you plan to have an event in the backyard please contact me ahead of time to coordinate. Our building is only two to three stops from Manhattan via the 4, 5, and F trains, and a couple of stops from Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Compare this to other Brooklyn apartments that are half an hour or more from Manhattan.  We are also only steps away from Pier 6 where you can hop on a water taxi into the city or Governor's Island, play some beach volleyball or walk down the promenade. Easy access to Grocery stores for food shopping and other daily amenities as well. Located just a few blocks from the G train and J/Z trains also, it is easy to get to different parts of Manhattan in 10 minutes by subway (Union Square, Lower East Side). Includes full kitchen with dishware and cookware. AII sheets, bIankets, and toweIs are provided. Personal keys so you may come and go as you please and the building has extra security system and cameras installed. The apt has a skylight and three windows and an AC

name: 2 Rooms in Cottage NYC
space: Beautiful spacious cottage in NYC, private near all business, 5 minute to, Central Park,  and midtown Manhattan. Booking must be 2 days before arriving. Private room  with two beds Private room with Queen size bed Many restaurants and shops nearby. 15  minute cab ride from LaGuardia airport. There is also Bus and Subway. This unit has 2 bedrooms, a full kitchen, living room and one bathroom. Bedrooms are downstairs, half basement. Its located in Long Island City, one block from the trains N and Q and three blocks from R and M. Safe and quite neighborhood. Pharmacy, Deli, Supermarket, Liquor Store and many restaurants are two blocks away. Laundry is one small block away. Minimum of two guests and 2 days. Wireless Internet Heating One Queen Bed Double bunked bed One Sofa bed (queen size) Thanks for looking.

name: Minimalist loft in Williamsburg
space: After a day of enjoying this crazy city you need a calming place to come home to that is still in the middle of everything. Enjoy our modern, minimalist loft-like home with white floors and french doors is located in the very happening north side of Williamsburg in Brooklyn. This is in North Williamsburg just south of McCarren Park. Use online maps to see our location on the corner of Union and N11th, zip 11211. 5 minute walk to the L stop at Bedford or Lorimer L stop, and only 10 minutes to Union Square door to door. Very comfy queen sized bed and tons of light streaming through. French doors separate the spaces for privacy. Large eat-in kitchen with window, modern bathroom with a window and more light!  The art is by me and my husband, BK artists! Williamsburg has tons of the coolest bars and restaurants in the Brooklyn. Brooklyn Brewery, Roebling Tea Room, and Brooklyn Bowl are just down the street. Here's your chance to stay in super cool Williamsburg and still be minutes from Manh

name: Between Two Bridges 2BD -Whole Apt!
space: The apartment is a short two flight walkup in a pre-war building. Love to shop?  Soho is a 5 minute stroll away. A serious foodie?  Anthony Bourdain's favorite noodle shop is around the corner. A history buff?  Stroll across the Brooklyn Bridge with coffee in hand. All about art and music?  The city's hottest galleries and shows happen on the LES. Your master bedroom gets a lot of light. Sleep soundly on a tempurpedic bed.  Wifi, linens and towels are provided too. The second bedroom is spacious with a vintage drafting table.  There's a twin bed with a foam topper for extra comfort! The living room also has a modernist futon that folds flat into a bed for extra sleeping options.  The kitchen has everything you'll need, cups, plates, utensils, cookware. This is a family building, please be respectful of our apartment, our neighbors and the building. Please no loud music before 8am and after 9pm!  Please no parties! We're a couple (photographer and writer) who travel often.  From Budapes

name: 1 bedroom apt in Midtown West
space: 1 bedroom apartment (Midtown West), apartment located in Midtown West (Hell's kitchen) near Times Square (5 min walk). name: Sunny & spacious bedroom in Brooklyn
space: It's a really nice, sunny, spacious bedroom in 2 bedroom apartment. It has walk in closet, 2 huge windows, it's large and very clean. I moved in here 7-years-ago. I share the apartment with one very easy-going roommate.  Apartment itself has pretty spacious living-room with 2 windows, decent size bathroom and granite counter-topped kitchen. The apartment has all amenities so everything what's needed to sleep, cook, chill, hang out etc. meaning is fully equipped (ex.dishes, coffee maker, blender, extra blankets & pillows). We also have nice backyard where we just got garden furniture and it's going to be all ready for the sunbathing in spring, summer & fall time.  It's in 4 apartments building, very nice and quiet, with easy-going neighbors who are mostly friends.

name: Room next to Columbia Uni.
space: Very Spacious clean, private room in Columbia University campus area, very safe, 3min. distance to to 1-train. Great cafes, grocery, Starbucks etc. close by.   2nights stay max. You will be sharing the apt with female roommate who has her own private room.

name: Artsy Williamsburg  Retreat /Music & Vintage Lover
space: Ground floor with private, direct entrance from the street. Very large apartment with private bathroom and outdoor patio. The bedroom has a queen size bed, 2 windows,  and lots of plants. The living room has a very comfy Crate & Barrel  luxury queen size sleeper sofa couch, and adjoins the dining area and kitchen in an open layout. High ceilings throughout make it feel more like an artist loft. This is an older building with charm, not a modern condo. Please note many of the finishes are older. If you want to live in one of the best neighborhoods in Williamsburg and appreciate the vintage  brooklyn artist aesthetic, you'll love it here! the Living space is huge as the apartment was originally a nightclub, and has some of the original features like the bar.

space: Loft Suites @ The Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. The studio loft has an alcove bedroom area with a comfortable queen size bed and a pull out sofa in the living room area, which in total can easily sleep up to 4 guests. The loft is equipped with HD TVs in both the living and bedroom areas with premium cable channels. There are hardwood floors throughout and a full bathroom with shower/tub combination.

space: This beautiful large rooms with queen size beds and full size sleeper sofa, high ceiling, wooden floor, private bathroom and large open windows is beautifully furnished with view of the park. space: I'm subletting a private bedroom in my two bedroom apartment in the heart of the West Village (12th Street and 8th Ave). name: NYC Summer Getaway | Full Home 2BR
space: Travelling to NYC?  Come experience the quintessential NYC lifestyle -- like a true New Yorker, not a tourist. Our large two-bedroom, kid-friendly apartment is located in the charming and historic neighborhood of Astoria, directly across the river from mid-town Manhattan. It's perfect for families and travelers seeking enough space to unwind while in this extra crowded town. If you want to experience all NYC has to offer PLUS escape to a private oasis whenever you like this is the perfect place for you and your family/friends -- the apartment can comfortably sleep up to 4 adults or a combination of adults and kids with one bed in the master bedroom plus one bed and a crib in the second bedroom. Nearby attractions include Times Sq., all Broadway plays, all major Museums, Madison Sq Garden, Central Pk, Rockefeller Ctr and endless restaurants. name: Beautiful New Garden Apartment
space: This is a recently gut renovated apartment, very quiet, very clean, and in a perfect condition. The apartment is in a charming brown stone in one of New Yorks greatest neighborhoods, the Upper West Side. In addition to the bedroom (queen size tempurpedic bed), spacious living room, large fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher,  small office, and there is small private garden. There is a pull-out sofa that sleeps one or two.The apartment is located 100 yards from Central Park and is two blocks away from 7 different subway lines (A,B,C,D,1,2, and 3 lines). The apartment is walking distance to Times Square, Lincoln Center, Columbus Circle, the American History Museum, as well as tons of restaurants, shopping, the best grocery stores in town, two excellent movie theaters, and tons of bars. If you are looking for a peaceful place in the heart of Manhattan, this is it.  Please don't hesitate to contact me using the "Contact Me" button by my photo.

name: Lovely apt in Williamsburg, BK
space: The apartment itself is bright and comfortable. It is the perfect place for a couple or an individual here for work or to enjoy the city. name: Beautiful SoHo Luxury Apartment
space: One of the best buildings in the heart of SoHo. Doorman building, huge north facing windows with lots of light, spacious bedroom, bathroom and living room with galley kitchen. Cathedral ceilings, Flat-screen TV with cable, Apple desktop, high speed wifi, B&B Italia and Poltrona Frau furniture, Viking range and Sub-Zero refrigerator. Stylish decor, artwork, hardwood floors, huge shared roofdeck that looks out over all of SoHo. Also, washer and dryer in the apartment and lots of extra towels and sheets. Location is about perfect if you like world-class shopping, people watching, restaurants and bars. Around the corner from the Mercer Hotel and Broadway Ave. shopping. 5 minute walk to the West Village, East Village, NoHo, Tribeca and Lower East Side. B,D,F,M,6,N,R subway lines within 2 blocks. name: Modern apartment w/ gorgeous view
space: Beautiful bedroom available in a two bedroom apartment. The bedroom is bright and clean. it contains one full bed and one fold out couch. You'll have your own bathroom, which has a fantastic shower and a deep bathtub perfect for soaking in. Other amenities in the apartment include a kitchen with a gas stove and dishwasher, a washer/dryer, and a balcony with a gorgeous view of the Manhattan skyline. Wifi, Netflix, Hulu-Plus and an extensive movie library are also available. A small gym is in the basement of the building. The apartment is a very clean and comfortable home.  The apartment is located in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in a modern elevator building, and is only three blocks from the Lorimer Street L train.  Other amenities in the area include: Barcade, The West Cafe, Huckleberry Bar, Dumont Restaurant, Gimme Coffee, Kellogg's Diner, and numerous bars, lounges, restaurants, 24-hour delis, supermarkets, dollar stores, hardware stores, etc, etc.  Williamsburg is vibrant!

name: Sunny, clean br available
space: I'm subletting my clean, furnished room in a sunny apartment in south Williamsburg. The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (you share a bathroom with one of the other roommates), a terrace with a bench, spacious living room, a nice kitchen with granite counters and a washer and dryer. The TV in the living room has netflix and all that good stuff. The room has a full bed, desk, and armoire. You would be living with two amazing ladies in their 30s. My roommates are both very neat and like to keep the house clean. They are very kind and down to earth.

name: Panoramic View Central Park & NYC
