name: Private Room in Artist's Home, Stapleton, SI
space: Come to the other NYC. Have a private room in my two bedroom apartment/art studio. Quiet street and neighborhood on the North Shore, Stapleton is Staten Island's burgeoning art neighborhood. Prefer to hike and bike? Staten Island is NYC's greenest borough with lots of parks, including Gateway National Park (great for birding). Historical monuments and architecture abound (the only Frank Lloyd Wright in NYC is in Staten Island) as well as great museums and restaurants. Want to see "The City"? It's less than 40 minutes away by bus and ferry (Express Buses also available). The Ferry runs free 24/7 and provides you some of the best views of lower Manhattan, Brooklyn and New Jersey. Or view it all from along the North Shore in St. George, Stapleton, Rosebank and Fort Wadsworth.. If you drive, there is plenty of street parking available. My street-level apartment is cozy and stuffed with surprises. It has a private entrance from the rest of the building which provides us with a lovely patio

name: Cozy Nook in Heart of Williamsburg

With great eateries, shops, bars at your fingertips, Why bother with the crazy hustle and bustle of Manhattan (not to mention the prices!!)?? Williamsburg has the same quality, diversity, and creativity of the city without the crowds. Additionally, it is 100% safe! Even at 4-5 a.m. people are out and about, walking home from the local bars. You couldn't ask for a better location.  You will have your own private bedroom w/ shared bathroom in a three bedroom flat. It is a 4 floor walk up and it is only a few  floors away from an amazing, unobstructed 360 degree roof top view of the city that never sleeps! name: Brooklyn Design Loft
space: My partner Mitch and I  live in a 1100sq ft loft on the outskirts of Williamsburg .  One block to the Morgan L train, one block to a fantastic natural food market, Roberta's famous pizza, Momo sushi shack, bars and more. Artsy neighborhood with a calm feel.  We love to welcome all travelers who are looking for adventure and community. We are happy to give recommendations- but also happy to give you plenty of space and privacy to explore the city and Brooklyn on your own.  Our building is set among a group of warehouses that have recently been converted into art studios, restaurants and bars. This is what SoHo was before it exploded.  It's a 10 minute train ride to Williamsburg proper (Bedford L stop) where hipsters collect at delicious coffee shops in droves. And it's about 15-20 minutes to Union Square and the East Village. Lots of coffee shops, vintage stores, etc, be sure to explore this area, don't miss out. R train stop to to manhattan is half-block away, F, Q, B, N, D, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 trains within a 10 minute beautiful

name: Spacious 2BR near Botanic Garden
space: Please contact us before sending a reservation request, as we have too many variables to always keep our calendar 100% accurate.   Next available chunk of available time is June 12-July 2.  We also may be seeking long-term (12 months or so) subletters starting after August 7. Experience the heartbeat of Brooklyn in our very spacious third floor 2BR apartment in a historic elevator building.  Stroll down the world's first parkway along tree-lined brick pathways to the Brooklyn Museum (.6 mile), Botanic Gardens! (.6 mile) and the famous Prospect Park (.7 mile).   It's hard to believe these lovely, wide open spaces exist only 1/2 block from the 3 train at Nostrand Avenue (or 2 blocks from the 2/5 at President, or 2.5 long blocks to the 4/5 at Franklin), making Times Square a mere 40 minutes away.   Traditionally West Indian, the neighborhood of Crown Heights is quickly attracting trendy restaurants and shops like its chic neighbor across the park, Park Slope and the thriving neighborhood

name: Large Beautiful East Village 1-Bdrm
space: The beautifully-designed apartment is in an immaculately maintained historic walk-up and has been renovated with dark bamboo flooring, butcher-block counter tops, and includes new refrigerator, gas range, microwave, toaster, blender, and dishwasher!  There are also five south-facing windows, a 65” 4K TV with Hulu Plus, Netflix, Wi-Fi, and separate bedroom with queen bed.  The living room has a sectional couch and plenty of additional seating, including a dining area that seats up to 6 and an additional 2 stools for the kitchen counter.  The renovated bathroom has marble floors and bathtub/shower. Located in the heart of the East Village on Saint Marks Place, this apartment is only one block from Tompkins Square Park (with the best dog park in Manhattan), a few blocks from the 6, N, R, F, and L trains, Astor place, the New Museum, the Bowery, and the Lower East Side. name: Stylish & Quiet NYC Retreat!
space: About the apartment:  I have a beautiful and spacious 1st Floor 2-bedroom apartment in Southwest Harlem (no stairs to climb!), in which I rent out the guest bedroom to guests who'd like a really incredible place to stay while visiting NYC, but think that paying $350 a night for a really bad hotel is crazy (It is, right!?) About me:  I'm a really easy going, professional, 38 year old guy that loves to host visitors and make them feel at home.  All I ask from you is that you're clean, polite and respectful.  In return, I guarantee you an extremely comfortable space in which you will feel completely at home and welcome. Your stay includes an air-conditioned/heated private room (with fresh linens and towels), free Wi-Fi, use of the TV connected to Netflix & Hulu Plus (for free movies and TV shows), use of the fridge and kitchen with filtered water and coffee/tea service.  The bed has a VERY comfortable queen size mattress and there is also an armoire and a closet with hangers for your use.

name: Big room near Prospect Park! NY!
space: Welcome!  We are a couple and a very well behaved Havanese puppy named Luno, and we look forward to sharing our apartment with travelers.  Both of us are musicians in our thirties and we hope you are not bothered by us practicing :). Of course, as always, we are both very flexible and are willing to work with our guests schedules. The apartment is really big, has two huge bedrooms with a Queen size bed for one or two people (the one on the photo is where you would stay), shared kitchen and bathroom. The rent includes free internet (Wi-Fi) and all the utilities. There is a gas stove, oven and microwave if you like cooking. Laundry in the basement of the building with elevator. We are only two blocks from the subway and only two blocks from the most amazing park in Brooklyn: Prospect Park. In five minutes you will enjoy nature; lakes, woods and beautiful fauna. name: Manhattan -  Best Location in Midtown
space: Beautiful small one bedroom apartment in the exclusive, secure Turtle Bay area of East Midtown, Manhattan. The building is serviced by doormen 24-hours, 7 days a week and two elevators. Location is ideal for one or two individuals who wish to explore all the New York sites and hot spots or who will be working while in New York. The apartment was renovated to provide a  bedroom (with bathroom en suite), a small dining/sitting area, as well as a small shared kitchen. Bedroom features include: a queen-sized bed; a flat-screen television set; a small desk; and a reading nook with comfortable leather chairs. High quality bed linen and towels are provided and limited laundry service is available. Continental breakfast is included, at your option.  Apartment has wireless Internet. Neighborhood has an abundance of restaurants from almost any country in the world.  Many restaurants have take-out/delivery service. name: Sunny private room right off L train
space: Cozy, simple & sunny private room available in a 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath apartment in East Williamsburg! I am Airbnbing my room while I'm away. The apartment is located on the first floor of the building and is separated into two floors by a spiral staircase.  My room is located on the first floor of the apt. My bed is a very comfortable queen-sized Casper Matress! My room is located on the same floor as the kitchen and dining area, a full bathroom and my roommate Aurora's room. Both closets of each room are adjacent to each other. The full closets act as a soundproof wall. Downstairs is the living room, a half bath, and our other roommate Vanessa. name: Luxury, Adorable Studio Apartment

It is located on a quiet street within blocks of nice restaurants, fun bars and cafes. 3 blocks from the subway line 4,5,6. It is near Museum Mile, Madison Avenue Shopping and Health Clubs.  My home can easily become your home during your trip to New York.

name: Eastern Parkway Brooklyn 1BR Flat
space: Gorgeous, true one-bedroom apartment in Brooklyn in walk-up building with hardwood floors, near the Brooklyn museum, one block from 2/3/4/5 IRT Line. I am an artists traveling frequently, and this is a flat of tranquility and peace. 10 minutes to Downton Brooklyn, 20 minutes to Manhattan. This is true one bedroom apartment, with a full kitchen (Kitchen is fully equipped with range, oven, microwave, toaster, and super large refrigerator), huge bathroom, and living area that can sleep one more person.  I have many great books and DVD's you are welcome to read and view. There is a fresh food market across the street, and many bars and restaurants nearby on Franklin Avenue. A friend will serve as my property manager while I am away and will check the mail daily. They will have the keys to the apartment to enter only in an emergency. This place is ideal for couples traveling from overseas. I am LGBTQ friendly as well so please don't hesitate to inquire. Internet provided as well.

It has one large, fully-equipped (no dishwasher) kitchen.  My bedroom is on the opposite side of the apartment.   Laid out like a loft, the living/dining area open right into the kitchen. name: Gorgeous brownstone next to Prospect Park!
space: Our lovely home is an the entire floor of Park Slope brownstone. It has 1 (amazingly quiet and bright) bedroom plus an office space that fits a single bed, 14 foot ceiling, chandelier, wifi, flat screen TV w/ AppleTV and a renovated kitchen with dishwasher on the best block in Brooklyn! We also have 2 sweet cats who will love you.  It's 5 minutes from subways to Manhattan, with all the restaurants, shopping, and necessities you'd want a block away. 2 minute walk from Prospect Park where you can jog around a 4 mile bike path or go for a hike and get lost in nature.  Please note - the 2nd bedroom now has a nice single mattress pad that sleeps just like a real bed (unlike the one shown in the photo). If you don't need it, the room can also double as a yoga/meditation/work space.  Our home is relaxing, super comfortable place to stay while experiencing all NYC has to offer.

The building is located in a converted warehouse on the East River. 7 min walk to the G train Greenpoint station, or 12 min walk to Vernon-Jackson stop on 7 train, or 20 min walk (10 min by bus) to Bedford station on L train. A scenic East River ferry is just a few blocks away and runs straight to Manhattan, 34 Street one way and South Street Seaport the other way every 15 minutes. name: Private MasterBR w/ View of Museum
space: Airbnb verified. Wake up to a one-of-a-kind New York view - a DIRECT view of the center of front of the Brooklyn Museum. The bedroom could only be closer to the Museum if it were actually on the grounds. Stay in one of New York's safest, most convenient, and most beautiful locations. When Airbnb's top photographer, who had photographed hundreds of apartments, came to photograph our home, he couldn't stop talking about how lucky we are to live here (we agree!). [You can look up "The Martinique" on Eastern Parkway (third floor!) to see exactly where we are.] He said he'd never seen a place so ideally situated (he also noted how clean we keep it). We appreciate how special our spot is and enjoy sharing our home and the pleasures of living across the street from the Museum and the Botanic Garden. name: LUXURY 2BD/2BTH - HUGE PATIO
space: Unmatched amenities. Two bedroom, 2 full bathrooms, beautiful apartment in a fantastic neighborhood. Exactly central to SoHo, Nolita, NoHo, Little Italy, the Bowery, Chinatown, and the East Village. Amenities: We're on the first floor so it's painless to get in or out. High ceilings and exposed brick in every room for that New York style. Free WiFi and HD cable TV with Showtime. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, pots, pans, dishes, and wine glasses available for your enjoyment. There are two double beds in two bedrooms with clean, white luxury bedding and down comforters. With 2 full bathrooms, getting ready and out of the house will be much easier. Otherwise, it can be unpleasant having to share one bathroom between many people. But the apartment's best amenity has to be your own private 500 sq ft patio. space: Hello! I'm renting a large private guest room in a two bedroom loft. It's on the 2nd floor of a beautifully maintained, safe loft building that used to be a shirt factory - it has a lot of the unique, real loft building-type detail.  This space is also occupied by me - I'm an interior designer. It's a great for both couples or for people traveling on their own. Your bedroom: a minimally and tastefully furnished private room with a very comfortable (real) bed. It's located on the opposite end of the 1000 sq ft space from the second bedroom. There are double doors, also with a drape in front of them for privacy and a window above. -Closets with shelving & sheets, towels -Track lights, bedside lamp on dimmers -Wifi, Washer/Dryer  -Huge roof deck, views of Williamsburg Bridge and Manhattan -Best Williamsburg location- 5 minute walk from Bedford L, 1 s

space: This apartment has two bedrooms with one queen and one full size bed, a fully stocked kitchen, big bathroom,  wireless internet, tv for movies, washer/dryer and a backyard.   The backyard has a grill if you want to cook and a garden if you want to relax.  There will be cherry blossoms in the backyard depending on when you come.  We are 15 minutes (walking) from several different trains and from the very commercial Greenpoint, Williamsburg and Bushwick neighborhoods of Brooklyn.  It is a very young area but also culturally diverse, polish food abounds locally and every other kind within a short walk.  Come relax in this young hip brooklyn neighborhood at night and then walk over the Williamsburg bridge to the faster one in Manhattan during the day.  Thats what we do! name: Cozy 2 BD in Midtown West
space: Comfortable apartment in the heart of the city. Close to theaters, great restaurants, and transportation. The apartment is a two bedroom railroad apartment (one room leads into another) with one bathroom.  Both bedrooms have full size beds and ample closet space for your stay.   Sheets and towels are included.  The kitchen has the basics needed for cooking, except a microwave.  Wi-Fi and cable are available.  The apartment building is a fifth floor walk-up and there is no elevator.   The apartment is located 2 blocks from Times Square, close to Broadway theaters, and majority of trains A,C,E,N,Q,R,7,1 and Port Authority Bus Terminal.  Also steps away from many great restaurants and bars.   There is a $50 dollar cleaning fee that is not included in the airbnb total.  You pay when you arrive. The entire apartment. As needed. 2 blocks to Times Square and NQR trains and Port Authority A,C,E, 1 & 7 trains.

space: Hello + Welcome!   I'm Kristina and this listing is for a private bedroom in my two bedroom, one bathroom apartment.  The apartment is of the 4th floor of a walk-up building, meaning there is no elevator, only 3 flights of stairs.    Please do keep in mind that this is a guest room in my home and not intended to replicate the experience of staying in a hotel or bed and breakfast.  This apartment is especially great for people who are independent travelers.  As a freelancer, my schedule is busy and changes all the time.  It is possible we won't see much of each other. When I'm home I'm either working or unwinding in my room.  But, I'm always available via airbnb messaging.  About the neighborhood: This is a quiet, safe street in the middle of it all! name: PARK SLOPE: SWEET, LARGE 2BR DUPLEX
space: This two bedroom duplex  is located in Park Slope, Brooklyn. One of New York's popular locations.  This vacation rental consists of 2 living rooms, 2 bedrooms, 1 and a half bathrooms and a kitchen. There are 3 levels including a basement and a second floor. The room represented as living room 2 in the pictures and floor plan is in the basement of this accommodation. It is furnished with a double sized futon and a single bed. This basement room is also provided with a TV that is connected with  Ruko streaming. The ground floor consists of the living room, which is furnished with a sofa, chair and coffee table and also has a TV with main network channels via antenna, and a DVD Player and Roku streaming . There is also a phone in the apartment that can be used to make local calls. name: Stylish Designer Studio with Piano
space: Tastefully renovated and fully furnished studio apartment, with separate entrance in a 19th century landmark townhouse on a quite tree lined street in Sugar Hill - Harlem. The kitchen features a Nespresso machine for espresso lovers and a pietra cardosa counter top. There is a queen size sofa bed with a high quality latex mattress. It features a Steinway baby grand piano, a washer and dryer (one unit) and fast internet access (wifi) Only two subway stops to midtown Manhattan with A/D train. This is an artist friendly neighborhood with a great history. Billie Holiday lived on our street for a while and Duke Ellington just around the corner.  The neighborhood features some interesting museums too: The Morris - Jumel Mansion, Audubon Terrace and of course the famous Cloisters a little further uptown. The Hudson River is close and there is Riverbank and Jackie Robinson Park. Access to the garden can be arranged upon request.

Lots of intimate Cafe's, Restaurants, Bars, and the proximity to the East river gives it its special vibe. name: Magazine SOHO Studio Loft.  Read our reviews!
space: SOHO designer's loft space on THE HIPPEST street in NYC (Crosby). Fine linens, 16 foot ceilings, hardwood floors, TONS of light...the VERY best of downtown NYC!!! Hotels on this street start at $800 per night so this is a steal. Every detail has been thought of. BUT, you need to be able to walk up 4 flights of stairs should you rent. We DO NOT rent to more than 2 people so please don't (Website hidden by Airbnb) exceptions.  If you are looking to cook during your stay, this is not the flat/apt for you. We have a microwave, mini refrigerator and coffee maker with mugs. There is not a full kitchen for this rental. TV is Roku based. This rental basically functions like a high-end hotel room. name: Brownstone Sunny & Spacious top fl
space: Visiting Brooklyn? Why stay at a hotel? Enjoy the charm of historic tree-lined blocks and stately brownstones with a stay at Gallerie St. Charles.     The Gallerie St. Charles, an art-rich renovated top floor of a Brooklyn brownstone, is conveniently located near world-famous Brooklyn cultural attractions and Manhattan is a short subway ride away.   Set on quaint St. Charles Place, one block from landmark, tree-lined Eastern Parkway, Gallerie St. Charles is walking distance from internationally-renowned Brooklyn Museum, the Botanic Gardens, the Brooklyn Public Library’s Central branch and Prospect Park.   Coffee shops, burger havens and gourmet delis are just 2 short blocks away. And there’s free on-street parking and garage parking for a fee two blocks away.    Lower Manhattan landmarks and midtown Manhattan attractions are 20 minutes and 30 minutes away, respectively, making Broadway theaters, world—class shopping and restaurants easily and quickly accessible options. name: Elegant Uptown Historic District Garden Apartment
space: Your pied a terre on Sugar Hill.  You'll be the only guests of this owner occupied, self contained garden apartment directly across the street from the Morris-Jumel Mansion, George Washington’s headquarters for 1776′s Battle of Harlem Heights and home to the infamous grand horizontal, Madame Jumel.  At the time Duke Ellington dubbed the house “The Crown of Sugar Hill,” the immediate neighborhood was also home to W.E.B. DuBois, Paul Robeson, Count Basie, Lena Horne, Coleman Hawkins, Mary Lou Williams, Thurgood Marshall, and dozens of other Jazz Masters. The apartment features a private entrance, full kitchen and bath (tub and shower), a Garden/Sitting room with a trundle/day bed (Charles Rogers), a large bedroom with a full-sized bed that once passed for George Washingon's, and a second larger bedroom with an opulent queen size 19th century French brass bed (see floor plan). Blocks from... -Whole Foods -Brooklyn Brewery -Bedford Apple Store -McCarren Park -East River Park  -New York Water Taxi  -Duane Reade  - ...much more!  The lofted bedroom has a full size bed with a tempurapedic mattress, recessed lighting and wall mounted flatscreen TV (with Netflix) while the downstairs has a full size futon.  I live just a few minutes walk from both the L Bedford train and the JMZ Marcy train. A 30 min walk over the bridge into the LES. The neighborhood is extremely safe and savvy at all hours.  *Wifi   *AC / Heat  *Gas range / oven  *24 hour convenience store on the corner, among restaurants and coffee shops, yoga and cafes everywhere.  *Gym half block away. *Pilates studio 2 doors down. *Jazz

name: Bright Luxury in Tribeca & Views!
space: In the heart of beautiful Tribeca this two bedroom, two full baths apartment is perfect for one night or more. A modern-lover's dream, this place is like new, is squeeky clean and very bright. The building also has a full gym, 24- hour concierge and gorgeous roof top with panoramic views of the city. The apartment also boasts a sweet balcony with soaring views of magnificent uptown. name: Great 2BR / Brooklyn's Best Area (from May 1)
space: Everybody loves this apartment. Located on the 4th and top floor of a well-maintained small building, this 650 square foot (65 square meter) apartment gets great light and ventilation from its south and north exposures. This is a 2-bedroom apartment set up as a large, expansive one-bedroom that is perfect for a single professional, couple or small family.  It was recently professionally painted and features nice details like wood floors, a bathroom skylight, French doors and a decorative fireplace.  The building has two security doors, an intercom system, and a free washer/dryer in the basement.  NOTE: The apartment is partially furnished: a double bed, shelves for clothes and books, a clothes closet, a nice couch, a table and four (URL HIDDEN) well as cutlery, coffee maker and everything you need for cooking. There's also an a/c unit, multiple fans and a very good iPod docking station. Fast new WiFi is also included.

Two blocks from the park and a 20 minute train ride on the F and G lines to downtown Manhattan. Main avenue offers restaurants, coffee shops, bars, shops and movie theatre. Private entrance into this lower level apartment off street.  Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, stove top and microwave and kitchen ware.   Modern, newly tiled  bathroom with large walk in shower.  Linens provided.  Large comfortable living room area.  Large bedroom. Access to television & internet service.  A large play area in the living area which functions as a play space for kids or a second sleeping area for extra guests. Fully furnished apartment.  Linens and kitchen cookware included.

name: Spring, Central Park,  NYC! (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) .
space: A studio on W 72nd St, just 4 doors in from Central Park and across the street, from the famous Dakota, 2 buses and 2 subway lines on the corner, in an elevator/desk building.  On the 12th floor with a city view and completely quiet.  Two couches that can be slept on how they are or opened to queen size beds.  Full kitchen on the wall, hidden by French doors; and a nice bathroom with sink, shower and bath. Area doorman safe 24/7. TV, Wifi internet included and of course dishes, glasses, pots, towels and sheets. Air Conditioned to your comfort. After over 8 years of living here I still get a thrill when I walk out the door. Central Park gleams; there are people taking pictures of the famous Dakota; there are dozens of restaurants and shops within a 5 minute walk, and the Museum of Natural History and NY Historical Society are less than a 10 minute walk. The Metropolitan Museum of Art is just a walk, or bus ride, across Central Park, and a Broadway Show is a 15 minute subway ride away.

Good heating system in the winter and in the (email hidden), but once you open the windows it gets lots of fresh air.  Free Wi-Fi, fresh linens and towels provided.  APARTMENT The apartment is on the second floor without an elevator in the building (16 steps up to the second floor). There are only two apartments in the building. name: Exciting Lower East Side, Loft Life
space: I am an artist with a studio loft in Manhattan to sublet.  It's big, light, stylish, and comfy. Spacious 2 bedroom on the 4th floor (queen bed, single blow-up, and single sleeper sofa). Spa bath and designer kitchen. Best neighborhood for arts, eating, parks, shopping.  1 block from subway, steps from cuisine and nightlife. AND, Family friendly building.  In 15-20 minutes you can walk to SoHo, Little Italy, Chinatown, or ride the train to MoMa, walk the Williamsburg Bridge and ferry to Dumbo.  It's lively and cultural.  The Tenement Museum and Katz's Deli are nearby landmarks, also Sunshine Cinema with the latest art house films.  Around the corner are cheap eat dumplings, artisan pizza or 4 star restaurants.  Want to jog, bike, or bask in the sun? The East River Park is minutes away with waterfront bike paths connected for miles to the South Street Seaport, Staten Island ferry, Tribeca, Chelsea and upper west side.

name: Historic 3 Bedroom Eastern Parkway
space: Located in a Brownstone built in 1901, this is a beautiful, light filled 3 bedroom, 1 bath apartment on historic Eastern Parkway in Crown Heights. 1.5 blocks to the train, 0.5 blocks to shops, close to all. 3rd floor with amazing views, sleeps 6 comfortably and with both kosher and non-kosher amenities available. Brooklyn's BRAND NEW Barclay's Center is just 2 stops away on the express 4 train, or a 10 minute drive away.  We live on premises and are here to assist you! Very bright, sunny, and open 3 bedroom apartment located on the beautiful landmark Eastern Parkway. This apartment sprawls approximately 1,500 square feet, located in a private 3-family home, on a picturesque block in the very desirable neighborhood of Crown Heights. Only 2 flights up, located on the third floor. (Please note this a walkup – no elevator). Hardwood flooring throughout, and very well-maintained. 1.5 blocks to 3 (local) & 4 (express) trains, Jewish Children's Museum, and nearby to Barclay's Center, Brooklyn

name: Stylish 1BR in the heart of Nolita
space: Apartment located in the heart of Nolita and steps away from SOHO - one of the most hip and desirable neighborhoods in New York! The place is tastefully decorated and clean. Very large compared to New York standards. Sleeps up to 3 people comfortably - 1 bedroom with tempur-pedic queen bed, one very comfortable couch in the living room.  AMENITIES: Pretty much everything you would need! - Open kitchen with dishwasher   - Uber comfortable queen sized bed in master bedroom (see reviews) - Large sofa that can sleep a 3rd person if needed - Large dining area with a Day bed overlooking the street - best place to have your morning coffee and read - Fully equipped kitchen - Wireless internet - Large flat screen TV with cable - Home theater system - Bose speakers NEIGHBORHOOD: You cannot beat the location! name: West Side-C Park-Columbia Convenient & Quiet
space: Great apartment with high ceilings, silence and amazing convenience! It's close to Columbia / Central Park and everything citywide. Very safe, GREAT Neighborhood. Charming space with hardwood floors and brick walls. Use of bike included. Main floor (stairs only at the building front door) located in the back half of a building: away from street noise. PLEASE NOTE, THERE IS NO LUGGAGE STORAGE AFTER CHECK OUT TIME. (I'm sorry if this is a problem). The space UWS Apt. with the use of ONE Bike included! Kitchen/Living room, private master bedroom w/super comfy bed.   Bike to use for free, easy free parking & close cheap paid parking available parking. Easy free street parking. Clean & quiet apartment, Hardwood floors, exposed brick walls, and artsy decor. TV w/cable in the living room. Very fast Wifi, fully-equipped kitchen, clean sheets, pillowcases, bed-quilt covers, and towels all included. The bathroom has a bathtub and shower. Water pressure is fantastic. name: 100+ 5* reviews. W'burg 2 bdr w/ yard. Close to L
space: Renovated two-bedroom apartment with private garden for rent in  a quiet corner of Williamsburg Brooklyn (L-train, Lorimer stop. G-train, Metropolitan stop).  Great for adults and adults with kids.  This is a completely private and separate two bedroom unit with three beds (2 Queen beds and 1 twin bed). Brand new kitchen/living room installed recently.  New LED lights in the bathrooms and updated bedrooms as well.  Fun space with charm and lots of eco-friendly materials including reclaimed wood floors and non-VOC paints and insulation.   You will enter the apartment from the street level and descend three steps to a hallway with a coat closet and storage.  The ground floor has a kitchen/living room as well as a door to the yard. The living room has an L shaped couch for relaxing in front of a flat screen smart TV with live TV from YouTubeTV.  There is a guitar to play if you know how. name: West Village Gem - 2BR
space: This listing is for a charming two bedroom apartment on one of the most beautiful blocks in the city.  The apartment comes fully furnished and outfitted with everything you might need (kitchen utensils, TV, fresh linens,internet,etc..).  The C/E trains are a block and a half away, and the A/B/D/F trains at West 4th St. are just a couple of blocks further.  You really can get anywhere in the city really quickly from here.        Inside the apartment you'll find two bedrooms, one with a full sized bed and the other with a queen.  There is, as you can see in the photo, a fully furnished living room and kitchen.  There are air conditioning units in all of the rooms, as well as a blue air filter in the living area.  The television has basic cable, and the apartment gets wifi coverage throughout.  There are clean linens and towels provided and the place will be delivered to you clean and organized.  The apartment gets tons of light and is wonderfully comfortable.              I'm not sure wh

name: Large Room w/ Private Entrance
space: Available is a large bedroom with private entrance in 3 bedroom apartment. The room has a bed, desk, seating, and an empty chest of drawers and closet for your use. Apartment has a kitchen/dining area and a nice common space with stereo, turntable, and projector for movies. Apartment is located above the G train for easy access to fun locations(Union Square in 22 minutes, Williamsburg in 10 minutes). There are many cute restaurants and cafes near by on Dekalb, Franklin, Grand, and Lewis streets, including a new neighborhood spot just down stairs called Denim Cafe.

name: Bright, Bedstuy Gem
space: Welcome to this newly renovated 19th century red brick building, where you'll have a private entrance to a 3rd floor suite full of beautiful details -- for example: the skylights, custom furniture, granite kitchen countertop, marble tiled bathroom, amazing artwork, and high-speed internet. There is basic television service in the apartment (channels 2-22). The express and local trains (J,M,Z,G) are a 10-minute walk from the house, and there is a bus 2 blocks from the house (citymapper will get you anywhere you want to go). There are plenty of good places to grub within the neighborhood, as well as gems that deliver (seamless and grubhub are great food resources). The neighborhood is diverse, we (the owners) are super cool(!) and you'll truly feel like you're at home. The apartment has room for 3,  is ideal for two/a couple, or amazing for one! name: Curated 1BR on the prettiest block of the LES
space: One bedroom with a queen-sized bed (queen air mattress also available) in a 1939 art deco building on the Lower East Side. Steps from countless cafés, bakeries, bookstores, bars and boutiques, as well as all the world-class dining of downtown Manhattan. Expansive kitchen and living room, bath with tub and shower, windows in every room.

name: *Unique Master BR in Battery Park!*
space: This is the Master Bedroom of a shared apartment in a secure doorman building. For the price you get access to a living room, full kitchen access and great roommates. All amenities included. You will have your own room, but share the apartment with 2 men in their 30.  We live in lovely Battery Park City. It's the south-west tip of Manhattan, right by the Hudson River and right next to the new World Trade Center. Transportation is very convenient—all the trains meet down here. (4,5). (R). (1). (A,C,E). (J,M,Z); all within a 5-7 minute walk. You can be at Union Square in 15mins, including the walk to the station. You have your own room with windows facing a tree-filled courtyard, and your own bathroom. Full service and very secure doorman building. All amenities. WiFI. Air conditioning and heat. Get away from the noise and bustle of the city, and stay by the water where the air is fresh. There's dozens of green parks here and plenty to see in the new and rebuilt downtown of NYC.
